html:
WORK ORDER
{{ doc.name }}
Status: {{ doc.status }} Company: {{ doc.company }}
Item to Manufacture: {{ doc.production_item }} Qty to Manufacture: {{ doc.qty }}
Item Name: {{ doc.item_name }} Material Transferred: {{ doc.material_transferred_for_manufacturing }}
BOM No: {{ doc.bom_no }} Manufactured Qty: {{ doc.produced_qty }}
Work-in-Progress Warehouse: {{ doc.wip_warehouse }} Target Warehouse: {{ doc.fg_warehouse }}
Scrap Warehouse: {{ doc.scrap_warehouse }} Batch Size: {{ doc.batch_size }}
Has Serial No: {{ "✔" if doc.has_serial_no else "✖" }} Has Batch No: {{ "✔" if doc.has_batch_no else "✖" }}
Operations: {% for op in doc.operations %} {% endfor %}
# Operation Status Completed Qty Workstation Operation Description Batch Size Planned Start Actual Start Actual End Time (hrs) Operating Cost
{{ loop.index }} {{ op.operation }} {{ op.status }} {{ op.completed_qty or 0 }} {{ op.workstation or "" }} {{ op.description or "" }} {{ op.batch_size or "" }} {{ op.planned_start_time or "" }} {{ op.actual_start_time or "" }} {{ op.actual_end_time or "" }} {{ (op.time_in_mins | float / 60) | round(2) if op.time_in_mins else "0.00" }} {{ op.actual_operating_cost or 0 }}
Planned Operating Cost: ₹ {{ doc.planned_operating_cost or 0 }} Actual Operating Cost: ₹ {{ doc.actual_operating_cost or 0 }}
Total Operating Cost: ₹ {{ doc.total_operating_cost or 0 }} Stock UOM: {{ doc.stock_uom }}
name: Work order print format
